thread.title: BRIEF-Ajmera Realty & Infra India Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ajmera Realty & Infra India Dec Qtr Consol Profit Falls

organizations.name: brief-ajmera realty & infra india dec qtr consol profit falls feb
reuters) - ajmera realty & infra india ltd

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Ajmera Realty & Infra India Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT 210.1 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT 232.1 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 901.8 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 819.1 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO Source text - bit.ly/2BLJqz7 Further company coverage:
